channel.title: GeoDjango on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in GeoDjango on Memo Tut

item.title: What non-programmers and web application developers should do to clear the GeoDjango tutorial at explosive speed
item.description: This is the 24th day article of [FOSS4G Advent Calendar 2019](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/foss4g"FOSS4GAdventCalendar2019"). Introduction (Conclusion) Non-programmer/web application development beginner clears GeoDjango tutorial (Geospatial information starting with GeoDjango) What to do 0.Recognize that web application development is a stacked learning. Go through DjangoGirls Tutorial once to get an overview of website construction and Django. 2.Make a Location-Based Web App With Django and GeoDjango Learn how to operate PostgreSQL using DOCKER. The difficulty is low because you can’t ask for RESTful API implementation.
